name: loopsy
description: Cross-machine communication protocol for Claude Code

scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm build && node packages/cli/dist/index.js init
scripts.build: pnpm -r --filter=@loopsy/protocol build && pnpm -r --filter=@loopsy/discovery build && pnpm -r --filter=!@loopsy/protocol --filter=!@loopsy/discovery build
